DOC.brief_title: Treatment Primary Basal Cell Carcinomas Skin With Combination Topical Imiquimod Cryosurgery
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation efficacy : - Number patient : N=50 - Inclusion criterion : Basal cell carcinoma skin proven biopsy - Exclusion criterion : ( 1 ) Size tumor > 2cm ; ( 2 ) Distance eyelid < 1cm ; ( 3 ) Number tumor > 5 Treatment protocol : Patients apply imiquimod daily 14 day tumor rim 2mm around tumor . On day 14 session mild cryosurgery ( 2 cycle 10-15 second , open spray liquid nitrogen ) apply patient continue application imiquimod another 3 week evaluate . Persisting erosion consider persistence tumor imiquimod continue another 3 week with/or without cryosurgery session . The patient evaluate 1,3,6,12 month discontinuation imiquimod yearly thereafter relapse . In case clinical relapse , confirm biopsy .
